english: footprint pointing down; to walk slowly

etymology.description: Depicts a footprint pointing downward, representing slow walking.
etymology.interpretation: The image of a downward-facing footprint intuitively signifies a slow, deliberate motion, as if someone is carefully walking or trailing their feet.

examples.chinese: 我慢慢走(我慢慢走)，不着急。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ màn màn zǒu, bù zhuó jí.

examples.chinese: 他的脚步声很轻(他的腳步聲很輕)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de jiǎobù shēng hěn qīng.
